analysis.description:
NZOCrowdsale.defineCurrentPeriod (/unique_chucks/14/0x3e7203ef349c04b8cb46ebbfcb8ec046d7196504.sol#431-442) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _currentPeriod == 4

NZOCrowdsale.defineCurrentPeriod (/unique_chucks/14/0x3e7203ef349c04b8cb46ebbfcb8ec046d7196504.sol#431-442) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _currentPeriod == 4
NZOCrowdsale.getTotalAmountOfTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x3e7203ef349c04b8cb46ebbfcb8ec046d7196504.sol#406-430) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- currentPeriod == 0

MintableToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x3e7203ef349c04b8cb46ebbfcb8ec046d7196504.sol#287-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/14/0x3e7203ef349c04b8cb46ebbfcb8ec046d7196504.sol#297-298)

NZOCrowdsale.batchTransfer (/unique_chucks/14/0x3e7203ef349c04b8cb46ebbfcb8ec046d7196504.sol#524-530) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-paidTokens[_recipients[j]].sub(_values[j]) (/unique_chucks/14/0x3e7203ef349c04b8cb46ebbfcb8ec046d7196504.sol)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x3e7203ef349c04b8cb46ebbfcb8ec046d7196504.sol#63-65)
